taskbody.context: Use this procedure to install a local RHEL/CentOS repository mirror on a host. The mirror contains packages that are required on all cluster hosts, and its size is approximately 95MB (version 7.2 or 7.3) or 140MB (version 7.1).

step.cmd: Log in to the target host .

step.stepresult: The yum command copies the contents of the RPM file to /opt/zenoss-repo-mirror.

step.cmd: Copy the RPM file to the mirror directory.
step.stepresult: The yum command copies the contents of the RPM file to /opt/zenoss-repo-mirror.

step.cmd: Delete the RPM files, if desired.
